verses.verse: Now Abraham<WH85> journeyed<WH5265> from there<WH8033> toward the land<WH776> of the Negev,<WH5045> and settled<WH3427> between<WH996> Kadesh<WH6946> and Shur;<WH7793> then he sojourned<WH1481> in Gerar.<WH1642>
And Abraham<WH85> said<WH559> of Sarah<WH8283> his wife,<WH802> "She is my sister.<WH269>" So Abimelech<WH40> king<WH4428> of Gerar<WH1642> sent<WH7971> and took<WH3947> Sarah.<WH8283>

But God<WH430> came<WH935> to Abimelech<WH40> in a dream<WH2472> of the night,<WH3915> and said<WH559> to him, "Behold,<WH2009> you are a dead<WH4191> man because<WH5921> of the woman<WH802> whom<WH834> you have taken,<WH3947> for she is married.<WH1167> <WH1166>"
Now Abimelech<WH40> had not come<WH7126> near<WH7126> her; and he said,<WH559> "Lord,<WH136> wilt Thou slay<WH2026> a nation,<WH1471> even<WH1571> [though] blameless<WH6662>?

"Did he not himself<WH1931> say<WH559> to me, 'She is my sister<WH269>'? And she herself<WH1931> said,<WH559> 'He is my brother.<WH251>' In the integrity<WH8537> of my heart<WH3824> and the innocence<WH5356> of my hands<WH3709> I have done<WH6213> this.<WH2088>"

Then God<WH430> said<WH559> to him in the dream,<WH2472> "Yes,<WH1571> I know<WH3045> that in the integrity<WH8537> of your heart<WH3824> you have done<WH6213> this,<WH2088> and I also<WH1571> kept<WH2820> you from sinning<WH2398> against Me; therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> I did not let<WH5414> you touch<WH5060> her.

"Now<WH6258> therefore, restore<WH7725> the man's wife,<WH802> for he is a prophet,<WH5030> and he will pray<WH6419> for you, and you will live.<WH2421> But if<WH518> you do not restore<WH7725> [her,] know<WH3045> that you shall surely<WH4191> die,<WH4191> you and all<WH3605> who<WH834> are yours."

So Abimelech<WH40> arose<WH7925> early<WH7925> in the morning<WH1242> and called<WH7121> all<WH3605> his servants<WH5650> and told<WH1696> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things<WH1697> in their hearing;<WH241> and the men<WH376> were greatly<WH3966> frightened.<WH3372>

Then Abimelech<WH40> called<WH7121> Abraham<WH85> and said<WH559> to him, "What<WH4100> have you done<WH6213> to us? And how<WH4100> have I sinned<WH2398> against you, that you have brought<WH935> on me and on my kingdom<WH4467> a great<WH1419> sin<WH2401>? You have done<WH6213> to me things<WH4639> that ought not to be done.<WH6213>"
And Abimelech<WH40> said<WH559> to Abraham,<WH85> "What<WH4100> have you encountered,<WH7200> that you have done<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697>?"

And Abraham<WH85> said,<WH559> "Because<WH3588> I thought,<WH559> surely<WH7534> there<WH369> is no<WH369> fear<WH3374> of God<WH430> in this<WH2088> place;<WH4725> and they will kill<WH2026> me because<WH5921> <WH1697> of my wife.<WH802>
"Besides,<WH1571> she actually<WH546> is my sister,<WH269> the daughter<WH1323> of my father, but not the daughter<WH1> of my mother,<WH1323> and she became<WH517> my wife;<WH1961>

and it came<WH1961> about, when<WH9201> God<WH430> caused me to wander<WH8582> from my father's house,<WH1004> that I said<WH559> to her, 'This<WH2088> is the kindness<WH2617> which<WH834> you will show<WH6213> to me: everywhere<WH413> <WH3605> <WH4725> <WH834> <WH8033> we go,<WH935> say<WH559> of me, "He is my brother.<WH251>"' "

Abimelech<WH40> then took<WH3947> sheep<WH6629> and oxen<WH1241> and male<WH5650> and female<WH8198> servants,<WH5650> <WH8198> and gave<WH5414> them to Abraham,<WH85> and restored<WH7725> his wife<WH802> Sarah<WH8283> to him.
And Abimelech<WH40> said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2009> my land<WH776> is before<WH6440> you; settle<WH3427> wherever you please.<WH2896> <WH5869>"

And to Sarah<WH8283> he said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2009> I have given<WH5414> your brother<WH251> a thousand<WH505> pieces of silver;<WH3701> behold,<WH2009> it is your vindication<WH3682> before all<WH3605> who<WH834> are with you, and before<WH854> all<WH3605> men<WH3605> you are cleared.<WH3198>"
And Abraham<WH85> prayed<WH6419> to God;<WH430> and God<WH430> healed<WH7495> Abimelech<WH40> and his wife<WH802> and his maids,<WH519> so that they bore<WH3205> [children.]
For the Lord<WH3068> had closed<WH6113> fast<WH6113> all<WH3605> the wombs<WH7358> of the household<WH1004> of Abimelech<WH40> because<WH5921> <WH1697> of Sarah,<WH8283> Abraham's wife.<WH802>
